ygData.messageBody:
Another player in our guild works on these with me.
They are quite amusing to learn actually, if your into
that.

And I agree with Kim, you need to be in the same zone,
you can't increase while teaching only the student,
and now when the skill goes up, you see it like you
were doing pottery or similar. A nice addition IMHO.

Hope this helps

Rob
